channel.title: Need help! urgent!
channel.description:
Well, i just downloaded carl 554 cache, client and source. I putted the map cache554 in C:\. I opened load.bat. Now i opened the client, but it got stuck in: Connecting to update server or something. And in the client run.bat i see:
error_game_js5connect

item.title: Need help! urgent!
item.dc:creator: @ry60003333 ry60003333
item.description:
@ry60003333 wrote:

The server you are trying to connect to is offline. The client will not startup unless it can connect to the update server, which is just the regular server.

iDontRun:

You need the change the IP that the client connects to, if you’ve built in a no-ip it won’t work for your specific computer, you need to use 127.0.0.1 (only if your connecting to your own source!).

This is correct, if you are running the server, use 127.0.0.1 as the IP address.

Read full topic

and did you edit your client so it connects to your computer?

item.description:
@xweetok599 wrote:

I opened the load.bat (the file that opens the server). There can be no way that it isn’t online if it is on my pc.
